name: Nike Air Max 90
description: Iconic Air Max 90 featuring visible Air cushioning and classic design. Perfect for everyday comfort and style.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The legendary AF1 with premium leather upper and Air-Sole unit for comfort that never goes out of style.

name: Nike Dunk Low Retro
description: The hoops icon returns with classic styling and modern comfort. Features padded, low-cut collar.

name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid
description: A fresh take on the classic that started it all. Premium leather and iconic Wings logo.

name: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: Vintage vibes with exposed foam on the tongue and a crisp leather upper for throwback style.

name: Nike React Infinity Run 3
description: Designed to help keep you running. Nike React foam and a wider platform offer stability and cushioning.

name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly Next% 2
description: Built for record-breaking speed. ZoomX foam and full-length carbon fiber plate for race day performance.

name: Nike Pegasus 40
description: The running icon with responsive cushioning. Perfect for daily training and long-distance runs.

name: Nike Air Max 97
description: The future of Air with full-length visible Air unit. Sleek lines inspired by Japanese bullet trains.

name: Nike Air Max Plus
description: Bold, aggressive design with Tuned Air for responsive cushioning. A streetwear essential.

name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly 3
description: Elite racing shoe with AtomKnit 3.0 upper and dual Air Zoom units for explosive energy return.

name: Nike Free Run 5.0
description: Natural motion meets cushioned support. Flexible grooves let your foot move freely.

name: Nike Metcon 9
description: The gold standard for training. Stable base and flexible forefoot for any workout.

name: Nike Air Huarache
description: Iconic neoprene bootie with mesh panels for a snug, sock-like fit and all-day comfort.

name: Nike SB Dunk Low Pro
description: Skate-ready with Zoom Air insole and padded tongue for board feel and impact protection.

name: Nike Air VaporMax 2023
description: Walk on Air with the revolutionary VaporMax Air unit. Lightweight and ultra-bouncy.

name: Nike Court Vision Low
description: Basketball-inspired style for everyday wear. Classic design meets modern comfort.

name: Nike Waffle One
description: Heritage-inspired design with modern materials. Waffle outsole provides excellent traction.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Big Air, big style. Features Nike's largest heel Air unit yet for maximum cushioning.

name: Nike Zoom Fly 5
description: Fast training shoe with responsive ZoomX foam. Perfect for tempo runs and race prep.

name: Nike Air Jordan 4 Retro
description: The beloved Jordan 4 with signature wing eyelets and mesh panels. A timeless classic.

name: Nike Invincible 3
description: Maximum cushioning for high mileage. ZoomX foam provides incredible energy return.

name: Nike Cortez
description: The OG Nike running shoe reborn as a style icon. Classic herringbone outsole pattern.

name: Nike Air Max SC
description: Retro-inspired runner with visible Air cushioning. Lightweight and comfortable for all day.

name: Nike Revolution 6
description: Soft foam cushioning and breathable mesh for comfortable everyday running.

name: Nike Air Presto
description: T-shirt for your feet. Stretchy mesh upper provides a snug, adaptive fit.

name: Nike Dunk High Retro
description: High-top heritage with basketball DNA. Premium leather and padded collar for support.

name: Nike Air Zoom Structure 25
description: Stability running shoe with dual-density foam. Perfect for overpronators.

name: Nike Killshot 2
description: Tennis-inspired lifestyle shoe with clean lines and gum rubber outsole.

name: Nike Air Max Terrascape 90
description: Eco-friendly Air Max with at least 10% recycled materials. Trail-ready outsole.

name: Nike Air Jordan 11 Retro
description: The most iconic Jordan ever. Patent leather shine and carbon fiber plate.

name: Nike Monarch IV
description: The dad shoe legend. Comfortable cushioning for all-day support and style.

name: Nike ACG Mountain Fly 2
description: Trail-ready with React foam and rugged outsole. All Conditions Gear for any terrain.

name: Nike Tech Hera
description: Futuristic design with layered materials. Bold style for the fashion-forward.

name: Nike P-6000
description: 2000s running aesthetic reborn. Mesh and leather upper with visible Air cushioning.

name: Nike Air Rift
description: Split-toe design inspired by Kenyan runners. Unique look with comfortable fit.

name: Nike Wildhorse 8
description: Trail running champion with aggressive outsole and rock plate protection.

name: Nike Air Max Dawn
description: New-school Air Max with sustainably-made materials. Fresh style, lower impact.

name: Nike Zoom Vomero 17
description: Plush cushioning for long runs. ZoomX foam delivers responsive comfort mile after mile.

name: Nike LeBron XXI
description: King James' signature shoe with Zoom Air Strobel and cable-based containment system.
